org.springframework.jdbc.core
Class SQLExceptionTranslatorFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.springframework.jdbc.core.SQLExceptionTranslatorFactory
public class SQLExceptionTranslatorFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory for creating SQLExceptionTranslator based on the DatabaseProductName taken from the DatabaseMetaData.

Returns a SQLExceptionTranslator populated with vendor codes defined in a configuration file named "sql-error-codes.xml". Reads the default file in this package if not overridden by a file in the root of the classpath (e.g. in the WEB-INF/classes directory).

Version:
$Id: SQLExceptionTranslatorFactory.java,v 1.1 2003/08/22 08:18:33 jhoeller Exp $
Author:
Thomas Risberg
